translations.You have removed {acl} from the board {b: Ci nd'as bogadu {acl} dae sa lavagna {board}

translations.A <strong>comment</strong> was created o: Unu cummentu est istadu creadu in s'ischeda
translations.The uploaded file exceeds the upload_max: S'archìviu carrigadu superat sa diretiva upload_max_filesize in php.ini
translations.The uploaded file exceeds the MAX_FILE_S: S'archìviu carrigadu superat sa diretiva MAX_FILE_SIZE ispetzificada in su mòdulu HTML
translations.The file was only partially uploaded: Isceti una parte de s'archìviu est carrigada
translations.Could not write file to disk: No at fatu a iscrìere s'archìviu in su discu
translations.A PHP extension stopped the file upload: Un'estensione PHP at firmadu su carrigamentu de s'archìviu
translations.No file uploaded or file size exceeds ma: Perun'archìviu carrigadu o sa mannària de s'archìviu superat su màssimu de %s
translations.The card \"%s\" on \"%s\" has been assig: S'ischeda "%s" in "%s" s'est istadu assignadu dae %s.
translations.The card \"%s\" on \"%s\" has reached it: S'ischeda "%s" in "%s" est cròmpida a sa data de iscadèntzia.
translations.The card {deck-card} on {deck-board} has: S'ischeda {deck-card} in {deck-board} est cròmpida a sa data de iscadèntzia.
translations.{user} has mentioned you in a comment on: {user} t'at mentovadu in unu cummentu in {deck-card}.
translations.The board \"%s\" has been shared with yo: Sa lavagna "%s" est istada cumpartzida cun tegus dae %s.
translations.No data was provided to create an attach: Perunu datu frunidu pro creare un'alligongiadu
translations.Path is already shared with this card: Su caminu est giai cumpartzidu cun cust'ischeda
translations.Invalid date, date format must be YYYY-M: Data non bàlida, su formadu de sa data depet èssere AAAA-MM-GG
translations.Personal planning and team project organ: Pranificatzione personale e organizatzione de su progetu de iscuadra
translations.Select the board to link to a project: Seletziona lavagna de collegare a unu progetu
translations.Search by board title: Chirca dae su tìtulu de sa lavagna
translations.Select the card to link to a project: Seletzioan s'ischeda de collegare a unu progetu
translations.This board is read only: Custa lavagna est isceti pro lèghere
translations.Drop your files to upload: Lassa is archìvios pro ddos carrigare
translations.A file with the name {filename} already: B'at giai un'archìviu cun su nùmene de {filename}.
translations.Create a new list to add cards to this b: Crea un'elencu nou de agiùnghere ischedas a custa lavagna
translations.Failed to create share with {displayName: No at fatu a creare cumpartzidura cun {displayName}
translations.Archive all cards in this list: Archìvia totu is ischedas in cust'elencu
translations.title and color value must be provided: tocat de frunire su tìtulu e su balore de su colore
Su tìtulu non podet èssere bòidu
translations.Open in bigger view: Aberi in una bista prus ampra
translations.Failed to load comments: No at fatu a carrigare is cummentos
translations.No comments yet. Begin the discussion!: Perunu cummentu ancora. Cumintzat sa chistionada!
Su cummentu non podet èssere bòidu
translations.The comment cannot be longer than 1000 c: Su cummentu non podet èssere prus longu de 1000 caràteres.
translations.Use bigger card view: Imprea bista cun ischedas prus mannas
translations.Turn on due date reminders: Allughe is notìficas pro ammentare is iscadèntzias
translations.Turn off due date reminders: Istuda is notìficas pro ammentare is iscadèntzias
translations.Loading filtered view: Carrigamentu de sa bista cun su filtru
translations.Maximum file size of {size} exceeded: Mannària màssima de s'archìviu de {size} superada
translations.Error creating the share: Errore in sa creatzione de sa cumpatzidura
